      • closestPointTo

        public Vector closestPointTo(Vector point)
        Description copied from interface: Ray
        Returns the closest point on this ray to another ray. Note that this point can be further away from the origin of the ray than the length of the ray, the ray is treated as if it were infinitely long.
        Specified by:
        closestPointTo in interface Ray
        Parameters:
        point - the point
        Returns:
        the closest point on this ray to another point
